definition: to grind one's teeth (during sleep)/pointless arguing/(coll.) molar
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Even though, the erupting age of third molars is important to oral clinic.
sentences.chinese: 即使萌出的第三磨牙也很少能建立正常的咬合关系。

sentences.english: We put forward the suitable moments for rotation of human's teeth.
sentences.chinese: 提出了人尖牙和前磨牙扭转移动时的适宜力矩。

sentences.english: Perhaps that's because the premolars were doing all the hard work, he suggests.
sentences.chinese: 他建议道，也许那是因为前磨牙做着所有艰辛的工作。

sentences.english: The retention of gold alloy clasp on the molar was greater than that on the premolar in the same condition of undercut.
sentences.chinese: 相同倒凹深度上，磨牙金合金卡环固位力比前磨牙大。

sentences.english: The retention of gold alloy clasp on the molar was greater than that on the premolar in the same condition of undercut.
sentences.chinese: 相同倒凹深度上，磨牙金合金卡环固位力比前磨牙大。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate clinical effect of composite inlays in the defective molars.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察复合树脂嵌体修复磨牙缺损的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of recessive artificial teeth repaired of first anterior molar deletion.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察隐形义齿修复第1前磨牙的临床效果。

sentences.english: I want to extract a tooth. It's the lower, left, third molar.
sentences.chinese: 我要给病人拔牙，拔的是下排左边的第三颗磨牙。

sentences.english: The retention of the clasp on molar is greater than premolar in the same condition of undercut.
sentences.chinese: 相同倒凹条件下，磨牙卡环的固位力比前磨牙卡环大。

sentences.english: The retention of the clasp on molar is greater than premolar in the same condition of undercut.
sentences.chinese: 相同倒凹条件下，磨牙卡环的固位力比前磨牙卡环大。

sentences.english: They are both grinding teeth to suck blood.
And there is 83.58% second molar malocclusion with the third molar existing in the same quadrant.
sentences.chinese: 第二磨牙错牙合畸形伴有同象限第三磨牙存在。

sentences.english: And there is 83.58% second molar malocclusion with the third molar existing in the same quadrant.
sentences.chinese: 第二磨牙错牙合畸形伴有同象限第三磨牙存在。

sentences.english: Teeth grinding can be prevented with night guards made by dentists through upper and lower impressions.
sentences.chinese: 磨牙可以预防与牙医通过上下印象夜间警卫。

sentences.english: To investigate the availability of inlay-crown restoration for molar residual crown.
sentences.chinese: 探索嵌体冠在磨牙残冠的可用性。

sentences.english: Wearing a dental guard or splint at night is usually the next step for bruxism.
sentences.chinese: 佩戴护齿牙夹板是治疗夜间磨牙症的第二步。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
to grow replacement teeth (zoology)/to grow permanent teeth in place of milk teeth
(of uneven surfaces) to fit together/(of gear wheels) to mesh/(dentistry) occlusion/bite
